website_summaries.verdict: The overall reaction of people towards the Gel Torrance Trail has been mostly positive. This Asics trail running shoe is lauded for providing individuals with a versatile underfoot experience, whether on the trails or the roads. The appealing design and affordable price are also highlighted.Fans of running footwear that accommodate both casual use and active lifestyles can enjoy the Asics Gel Torrance Trail.
pros: People have mentioned that the lightweight nature of the Asics Gel Torrance Trailis a boon for fans of all-day adventures
The underfoot cushioning system is praised for cushioning the foot responsibly
Some users have noted that this trail running shoe has a versatile construction that permits quick transitions to flat surfaces
The silhouette of this product is welcomed because it is sporty yet not obnoxiously large
Several purchasers have noted that the price is affordable
cons: A few people have complained that the platform is a bit thin for long-term support
A couple of users have noted that the midfoot part of the upper restricts the foot and chafes the skin

customer_reviews.title: Less then two months and shoe is coming apart
customer_reviews.text: I generally like ASICS for road running. My old ASICS, I had for almost two years but the thread was gone so I decided to stick to the same brand. Unfortunately, these were not made of the same cloth because less then two months in, the front toe cap/box of the right shoe is already coming apart. A bit disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V.

customer_reviews.title: very comfy but.....
customer_reviews.text: these lasted 3 months of daily use before the mesh started to tear at the toes and the heel fabric wore out. NOT designed to last
customer_reviews.author: 88KeysAlive

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, with a proviso
customer_reviews.text: I like and have worn Asics running shoes for casual and walking purposes for over 20 years. Fit is never a problem, and that is also the case with these shoes. The one oddity (or proviso) with these shoes is that they offer no arch support whatsoever. My arches are rather high, and one of the things that I've always enjoyed about Asics running shoes is that I always feel well supported. I do intend to keep these shoes, as they are otherwise comfortable, and look really great. But, if you, like me, have higher arches, make sure to get yourself some insoles that will do the job that the stock insoles that come with the shoe do not.
customer_reviews.author: Producer-Man

customer_reviews.title: Not Grey
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I bought it thinking it was grey with orange highlights. It is definitely a purple shoe. Fits well, and is fairly comfortable. it wears out about the same speed as other Asics, which to me means it is a decent value for the cost. At the time I was deciding between two shoes, and I wish I had gone with the other pair, but again these are not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight trail shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice lightweight trail shoe. Good combo of grip, cushion,& support
customer_reviews.author: C. Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Regular Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these hoping they would last longer than regular running shoes since they were trail type. Well, they did last a little longer but still ended with the same holes in the mesh. I do like them but they just wore faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: First impression
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . Shoe looks great. Has a good tread, but I expected more cushion in the insole tbh
customer_reviews.author: Chris Chapin

customer_reviews.title: Ordered a 6w in Men's, it seems like instead I got a 6w in Women's
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 6w in Men's, what I got seems closer to a 6w in Women's. So unsurprisingly, they're wayy to small and squeeze my foot super tightly. I had to loosen the laces so much that they weren't even long enough to tie.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars, I would. These sneakers are TERRIBLE. I walked two miles on my local trail and I have huge blisters on the pad of my foot and my toes. My feet went numb during the walk. These sneakers are cheaply made, feel like plastic and have zero support. Do NOT by sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good fit running or walking shoe. Needed to get back in shape and this is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: William Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after 3.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Got the womans and, they were brand new March it’s now July and they have already started ripping, wouldn’t recommend if you wear sneakers to work
customer_reviews.author: Court

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Such a comfortable shoe, 2nd pair. Durable and feel as good now as when purchased 1 year ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are excellent. Sole is not the best of the Asics, but pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: harun

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best fitting shoes I've ever had. I have extra wide feet that are 10.5 US....basically rectangular feet. These shoes are incredibly comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. L

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes especially for $40
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 15 x wide and it fits just like a15 4e. Light weight and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe I normally wear a Gel 6, Couldn’t find so great substitute
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: The mesh above the toes gave out and rubber toe kick pulled away from the shoe in no time.
customer_reviews.author: bensmom

customer_reviews.title: They are very lightweight and comfortable, good grip
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are real comfortable. There was no break in time needed. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical when buying shoes online. Will they be too tight, not wide enough, etc. These shoes fit perfect right out of the box. No breaking in period needed. They are my go-to exercise shoe.
customer_reviews.author: R. Brocious

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, fits great. Toe box plenty long. Sole has small cutouts to aid in flexibility, I assume. I just hope it doesn't lead to premature tearing.
customer_reviews.author: lvm

customer_reviews.title: short life
customer_reviews.text: First off I really liked this shoe, but after only 4 months of use, no running, just casual wear there is a hole formed on the side by my little toe and the fabric is wearing across the top. To me this is premature wear. I do not wear them daily either. 3 or 4 times a week at best. But it is very comfortable and light, good support and the bottom tread is still in great shape. I am going to order 1 more pair and see how it goes. And I didn't buy it from Amazon the first time. Some store in Colorado when I was there for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Dick M. Hess

customer_reviews.title: hard to run with one shoe
customer_reviews.text: I only had these shoes a short and one of the shoes is coming apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: alan ikard

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Torrance Trail Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Specifically designed to help you go further, this specialized ASICS model is equipped for seemingly endless running, providing guidance and premium comfort every step of the way.
